channel.title: hugo on Cortically Magnified
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Cortically Magnified

item.title: About this site
item.description: How the sausage is made: a tutorial on building a personal website I started this website in 2018, because I wanted to collect all my content in one single place, and I wanted to build it with very simple tools. I had used several blogging platforms in the past, but was never happy with any one of them. So I decided to build something almost from scratch, to suit my personal needs.
